yāayyuhā al-nabiyu idhā ṭallaqtumu al-nisāa faṭalliqūhunna liʿiddatihinna wa-aḥṣū al-ʿidata wa-ittaqū al-laha rabbakum lā tukh'rijūhunna min buyūtihinna walā yakhruj'na illā an yatīna bifāḥishatin mubayyinatin watil'ka ḥudūdu al-lahi waman yataʿadda ḥudūda al-lahi faqad ẓalama nafsahu lā tadrī laʿalla al-laha yuḥ'dithu baʿda dhālika amran

fa-idhā balaghna ajalahunna fa-amsikūhunna bimaʿrūfin aw fāriqūhunna bimaʿrūfin wa-ashhidū dhaway ʿadlin minkum wa-aqīmū al-shahādata lillahi dhālikum yūʿaẓu bihi man kāna yu'minu bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-ākhiri waman yattaqi al-laha yajʿal lahu makhrajan
wayarzuq'hu min ḥaythu lā yaḥtasibu waman yatawakkal ʿalā al-lahi fahuwa ḥasbuhu inna al-laha bālighu amrihi qad jaʿala al-lahu likulli shayin qadran

wa-allāī ya-is'na mina al-maḥīḍi min nisāikum ini ir'tabtum faʿiddatuhunna thalāthatu ashhurin wa-allāī lam yaḥiḍ'na wa-ulātu al-aḥmāli ajaluhunna an yaḍaʿna ḥamlahunna waman yattaqi al-laha yajʿal lahu min amrihi yus'ran
dhālika amru al-lahi anzalahu ilaykum waman yattaqi al-laha yukaffir ʿanhu sayyiātihi wayuʿ'ẓim lahu ajran

askinūhunna min ḥaythu sakantum min wuj'dikum walā tuḍārrūhunna lituḍayyiqū ʿalayhinna wa-in kunna ulāti ḥamlin fa-anfiqū ʿalayhinna ḥattā yaḍaʿna ḥamlahunna fa-in arḍaʿna lakum faātūhunna ujūrahunna watamirū baynakum bimaʿrūfin wa-in taʿāsartum fasatur'ḍiʿu lahu ukh'rā
liyunfiq dhū saʿatin min saʿatihi waman qudira ʿalayhi riz'quhu falyunfiq mimmā ātāhu al-lahu lā yukallifu al-lahu nafsan illā mā ātāhā sayajʿalu al-lahu baʿda ʿus'rin yus'ran
waka-ayyin min qaryatin ʿatat ʿan amri rabbihā warusulihi faḥāsabnāhā ḥisāban shadīdan waʿadhabnāhā ʿadhāban nuk'ran
fadhāqat wabāla amrihā wakāna ʿāqibatu amrihā khus'ran
aʿadda al-lahu lahum ʿadhāban shadīdan fa-ittaqū al-laha yāulī al-albābi alladhīna āmanū qad anzala al-lahu ilaykum dhik'ran

rasūlan yatlū ʿalaykum āyāti al-lahi mubayyinātin liyukh'rija alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti mina al-ẓulumāti ilā al-nūri waman yu'min bil-lahi wayaʿmal ṣāliḥan yud'khil'hu jannātin tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru khālidīna fīhā abadan qad aḥsana al-lahu lahu riz'qan
al-lahu alladhī khalaqa sabʿa samāwātin wamina al-arḍi mith'lahunna yatanazzalu al-amru baynahunna litaʿlamū anna al-laha ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun wa-anna al-laha qad aḥāṭa bikulli shayin ʿil'man
